title: Eight Views of the Xiao and Xiang Rivers
medium: One of a triptych of hanging scrolls; ink and color on paper
dimensions:
60 7/8 x 23 1/4 in. (154.6 x 59.1 cm)
Entire scroll: 93 3/4 x 29 3/8 in. (238.1 x 74.6 cm)
Width w/ rollers: 31 3/4 in. (80.6 cm)
creditLine: Purchase, Harris Brisbane Dick Fund; Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation Gifts; Gifts of Major General R. B. Woodruff, C. M. Owen, Elizabeth B. Gerhard, and Mr. and Mrs. Teiji Ito; Bequests of Stephen Whitney Phoenix and Bruce Webster, Fletcher Fund, and The Howard Mansfield Collection, Gift of Howard Mansfield, by exchange; and funds from various donors, 1985
repository: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY
